tossup_question: -   –  Using carbon-14 decay to determine the date of a material is an example of what technique?
tossup_answer: ANSWER: RADIOCARBON DATING (ACCEPT: RADIOMETRIC DATING, RADIOACTIVE DATING, CARBON DATING)
bonus_question: -   –  If you are located at 40 degree North latitude, when will the Sun appear directly overhead?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Never
X) Once a year
Y) Twice a year
Z) Four times a year
